mapper.update: UPDATE adjustment SET amount=#{amount}, adjustment_date=SYSDATE WHERE adjustment_id = #{adjustmentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adjustment (adjustment_id, seller_id, adjustment_date,amount) VALUES (SEQ_ADJUSTMENT.NEXTVAL,#{sellerId},SYSDATE,#{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT adjustment_id as adjustmentId,seller_id as sellerId, to_char(adjustment_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as adjustmentDate, amount FROM adjustment
